Commands.Stellar Circle 5: 3-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay.  Grants Small Max BRV Up for 3 turns.  Grants a low probability of inflicting Small Speed Down for 3 turns and gaining Small Speed Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Free Energy: Increases BRV based on Attack then raises it by 1.2 before inflicting an HP attack.  Grants a medium probability of inflicting Small Defense Down for 3 turns and gaining Small Defense Up for 3 turns.
Commands.BRV Up Advance: Raises self BRV based on Attack  Slightly raises Max BRV overflow limit for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Booster 8: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Very Large Max BRV Up for 6 turns.  Initiates a Chase Sequence if LB2 Passive Ability is learned.

Passives.Wolf Killer: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to Wolf-type targets.
Passives.Stellar Circle 5 Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Stellar Circle 5.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.First Strike: Moderately raises Attack at the start of each battle.
Passives.Free Energy Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Free Energy.
Passives.Stellar Circle 5 Charge: Increases the max uses of Stellar Circle 5 by 1.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Free Energy Charge: Increases the max uses of Free Energy by 1.
Passives.Gentle Knight: Slightly raises Attack based on the number of female allies in the party.
Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack).
Passives.Stellar Circle 5 Extend: Increases the max uses of Stellar Circle 5 by 2.When using Stellar Circle 5:- Increases its number of hits to 5.- Moderately raises its total potency.- Inflicts Stealing Mark for 5 turns.- Stealing Mark lowers Max BRV and Attack.- Grants Thievery for 5 turns.- Thievery raises Max BRV and Attack.- Moderately raises the success rate of Speed Down and slightly raises its potency.- Slightly raises the potency of Speed Up.- Extends the duration of all buffs and debuffs granted by 2 turns (except Thievery).Triggers an HP attack if BRV is over 80% Max BRV.While Thievery is active:- Turns Stellar Circle 5 to Stellar Circle 5+.- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with Stealing Mark.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Triggers an HP attack after use.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Free Energy Extend: Increases the max uses of Free Energy by 2.When using Free Energy:- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack.- Inflicts Stealing Mark for 5 turns.- Grants Thievery for 5 turns.- Slightly raises the success rate and potency of Defense Down.- Slightly raises the potency of Defense Up.While Thievery is active:- Turns Free Energy to Free Energy+.- After the BRV gain, deals a 2-HIT melee BRV attack.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with Stealing Mark.- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency boost.- Also deals greater BRV damage to targets afflicted with Stealing Mark.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.BRV Up Advance Extend: When using  BRV Up Advance , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises Attack

Weapons.Dagger of a Bandit's Caprice CP: 15: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Stellar Circle 5  and  Stellar Circle 5+  Moderately raises BRV gained after using  Free Energy  and  Free Energy+
Weapons.Butterfly Sword CP: 35: Increases Free Energy's BRV multiplier to 1.5.Raises the success rate of Small Defense Down.Extends Small Defense Up and Small Defense Down's durations to 5 turns.
Weapons.Verdant Slasher CP: 15: Slightly raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack for 3 turns after inflicting a debuff.
Weapons.Exploda CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Booster 8.
Weapons.Zwill Crossblade CP: 15: Increases Stellar Circle 5's potency and raises the success rate of Small Speed Down and Small Speed Up.Also extends Small Speed Up's duration.
